Label.en: If so, you might have been useful in helping to decipher this!

Label.en: Yep, that’s right, the key to deciphering Egyptian scripts was a chunk of rock with an inscription talking about tax!

Label.en: Wow, so did King Ptolemy V of Egypt! Maybe you guys would have been friends!
